data.text: Everything around me [MET] caused me to think that I would die;
But then I called out to Yahweh, saying,
Yahweh is kind and does what is right;
He protects those who ◄are helpless/cannot defend themselves►;
I must encourage/tell myself to ◄have inner peace/not worry any more►,
Yahweh has saved me [SYN] from dying,
So here on the earth, where people are still alive,
I continued to believe/trust in Yahweh,
Even when I was distressed/worried and said, “I cannot trust anyone,”
So now I will tell you [RHQ] what I will offer to Yahweh,
I will offer to him a cup of wine
When I am together with many [HYP] people who belong to Yahweh,
Yahweh is very grieved/sad when one of his people dies.
I am one of those who serve Yahweh;
So I will offer to him a sacrifice to thank him,
When I am together with many of [HYP] the people who belong to Yahweh,
